div.p: This Visualisation Guidance page aims to give guidance about how the visualisation COULD look like in an application that consumes the report.
This page also marks which elements SHALL be minimally available in any visualisation and how their minimal representation SHALL look like to be clinically safe
Examples are sometimes given in JSON or XML format but it SHALL be understood all structures can be expressed in both as per the FHIR standard.

The following information SHALL be visualized
